group.text: RELEASE NOTES FOR DAWN 2.1'
• 1. Use the '-data' switch to specify a different workspace if the disk access at your facility is slow or restricted in the default location. For instance: dawn -data /scratch/dawn_workspace

• 2. Toolbar actions on linux can be hidden using the plotting. If the part becomes small, instead of wrapping, some toolbar actions disappear. They can normally be found on the menu to the right of the toolbar (the white down arrow).
• 3. To reliably find the Dawn version you are using go to: * Help->About Dawn.
New features:
• Pydev update: 5.0.0 (http://pydev.blogspot.co.uk/2016/05/pydev-500-pyunit-view-persists-state.html)
• FileViewer (new FileNavigator replacement): sorting of files and folders.
• NCD Processing: calculation of crystallite thickness T parameter.
• Dataset Concatenation processing operation: works for two dimensional datasets and takes into account axes properly.

• XAS Sample Calculation tool: get transmission and optical depth profiles as well as quick predictions of X-ray fluorescence experiments, with support for escape peaks and scattering. Export the parameters to an input-file for XMI-MSIM for a full Monte Carlo simulation. Access this tool through the menu (Tools -> XAS Sample Calculation) or as a view (Window -> Show View -> Others -> Data Analysis - XAS -> XAS Sample Calculation).
• PEEMA perspective: lazy-loading of data, Image grid viewer, Spectrum viewer.
• Iso-Surface / Volume Renderer (BETA): Reset transform button added, non indices axes support, screenshot/print enabled.
Bug fixes:
• XRF analysis tool: add support for 10 eV channels
• Colour mapping tool: Histogram plot updates correctly on a trace update
• Multiple file selection drag and drop bug fixed: the first and last file opened both used to display the dataset of the first file
• Volume Renderer (BETA): algorithm improvements
Workflows:
• Workflows are not supported anymore in DAWN 2.1, although still present. They will be removed in DAWN 2.2 and accessible through the DAWN market place.
NOTE for Mac OS X
• This release has been fixed to Java 1.8.0 update 92. Please install this version. If a more up-to-date version is required then update line 63 of Dawn.app/Contents/Info.plist accordingly.
